nodes.title: About lightning LoRA
widgets_values: Tested all wan2.2 lightning LoRAs; all worked, but many keys didn't match. However, because it reduces generation time a lot, we added this lightning model. If you find the output quality is too bad, you can try the 20 steps workflow without lightning LoRA.
Stupid hack to fix the first frame being overbaked by the VAE, double the first frame and remove it after decoding.

nodes.title: Sampler settings
widgets_values:
| model            | Steps | cfg |
|---------------------|---------------|---------------|
| With 4 steps lightning LoRA            | 4                | 1.0               |
| Without 4 Steps lightning LoRA    | 20               | 6.0               |

nodes.title: Batch sizes
widgets_values:
## Batch sizes
Batch sizes depend on how many Video S2V Extend subgraphs you have added to the workflow.

Each Video S2V Extend subgraph will add 77 frames to the final output.

Example:

If you added 1 Video S2V Extend subgraph, you should set the batch size to 2.

We added 2 Video S2V Extend subgraphs, so the batch size value is 3.

## Chunk length

77 is the default length from the WAN2.2S2V official code. This model needs at least 73 frames. If you set the value too high, it might cause an out-of-memory issue.

So you can just leave 77 as it is.

nodes.title: ! Important
widgets_values: If you need longer video output, select the node below, click Ctrl+B, and set 'Batch sizes' value to 2. For additional extensions, use Ctrl+C and Ctrl+V to copy and paste the Video S2V Extend subgraph, connect wiring, and increment Batch sizes each time. Each will extend the frames by the Chunk length; default is 77.

nodes.title: Positive Prompt
widgets_values: The man is playing the guitar. He looks down at his hands playing the guitar and sings affectionately and gently.

nodes.title: Negative Prompt
widgets_values: 色调艳丽，过曝，静态，细节模糊不清，字幕，风格，作品，画作，画面，静止，整体发灰，最差质量，低质量，JPEG压缩残留，丑陋的，残缺的，多余的手指，画得不好的手部，画得不好的脸部，畸形的，毁容的，形态畸形的肢体，手指融合，静止不动的画面，杂乱的背景，三条腿，背景人很多，倒着走
